entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being addressed by Lockhart multiple times in the conversation. He is also described as having brilliant teeth.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is a professor who is scolding Harry for flying a car to Hogwarts and seeking publicity.

relationships.description: Lockhart is scolding Harry for his actions, indicating that Lockhart has authority over Harry.
Lockhart mentions that he gave Harry a taste for publicity when they were on the front page of the paper together.
